name: Auntie Sassafras 0
description:
This is a tiny D&D zine inspired by? Parodying? Anti-Sisyphus by Jared Sinclair.

Inside you'll find 5 alternatives to the classic White Box Magic User, complete with original illustrations, and a D20 table of random occurrences.

I want to make it clear that I only made this because Jared said people could make their own Anti-Sis, and then when I expressed concern that I was straying from the intent of the original, he did encourage me to finish it anyway.
